name: Tiny Lovers
description:
This game was made for the RSS - Garagem dos Jogos game jam.

In this game you control a boy and a girl who need to grab heart pieces and bring them together.

This game is just a prototype, so, feel free to send your feedback and maybe this can turn into a full game in the future.

Controls:

Left/Right arrow keys to move

Spacebar to jump

R to restart level

M to return to main menu
